colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,DNGOS GZHI 'OD GSAL SNYING PO'I DON KHRID CES BYA BA, RANG BZHAN RDZOGS PA CHEN PO'I RNAL 'BYOR PA KLONG CHEN RAB 'BYAMS KYIS, GANGS RI THOD DKAR GYI MGUL DPAL LHA LAS BABS PA'I RI NGOGS SU LEGS PAR BKOD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,DPAL SNGAGS KYI BDAG MO DANG, GZA'I RGYAL PO R'A HU LA DANG, DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PAS BKA' 'DI SRUNGS SHIG. ,YI GE LA 'DRA MIN 'CHOS PA BYUNG NA CHAD PAS CHOD CIG ,SNOD MIN LAM BSTAN CIG ,SKAL LDAN LA BKA' 'DI KHROL LA BYIN CIG ,SA MA YA: SA MA YA: DGE'O, DGE'O, DGE'O,, ,,
